name: Software Engineering Trends
short_description: Worked on a project for Docker Inc
description: An end-to-end framework helps companies predict software engineering trends and the developers to know more about a docker image. The project was done under the mentorship of Nandhini from Docker, with the aim to gather data from Docker Hub and analyze the trends. (Docker Hub is a cloud-based repository in which Docker users and partners create, test, store and distribute container images.)
